name: Astronomical
description:
Creators:

Rackorathh-music

Lost_In_Thoughts-mainart

FoxTrot-helped with art

RKtree-programming,some art and making this page you are currently reading.

A resource management game all about building your new colony in the miniature star system named UN-limited (United Nations-Limited). 

keep your resources above -100 or-else you will lose.

the more apartments you build the higher your score.

controls:

leftclick a planet to travel there

rightclick your current planet to mine for resources

leftclick your planet to see the resources it has and give or take resources

leftclick to place a building

rightclick to cancel a buildplacement

Wasd to move camera

Q to snap cam to ship

LeftShift to move camera fast

click the buttons on the top bar to build
